summary.title: The Cave
summary.author: Bubba Bubba Gump
summary.about: Explore an undiscovered cave and see what wonders lie below.  Can you live to tell?

chapters.heading: A Crack in the Earth
chapters.prose: As you are walking through the woods, you come across an outcrop of rock.  Looking more closely, you notice an opening into the ground.  It seems as if you can step right in.

chapters.heading: So far so good...
chapters.prose: You step inside what appears to be a cave.  There are two ways to go: left and right.  Choose a way forward; there's no turning back.

chapters.heading: Life Goes On
chapters.prose: Well, I guess you are not much for adventure.

chapters.heading: You Win!
chapters.prose: You discover the long lost booty of the dread pirate Stevens.  You are set for the rest of your long and enjoyable life.

chapters.heading: You Die!
chapters.prose: You take the passageway to the right, which goes ends in a drop-off.  Unfortunately, the cave is so dark at this point that you do not see where the floor disappears, and you fall to an untimely death.
